Name: PagerDuty - Open Maintenance Window
Description:
Open a new maintenance window for the specified services.

No new incidents will be created for a service that is currently in maintenance.

This script sets an output variable **WindowId** that can be used in the _PagerDuty - Close Maintenance Window_ template.
Author: nskerl

Parameters.Name: Minutes
Parameters.Label: Minutes
Parameters.HelpText: The length of the maintenance window in minutes.

Parameters.Name: RequesterId
Parameters.Label: RequesterId
Parameters.HelpText:
The user id of the user creating the maintenance window.

Found here: https://mydomain.pagerduty.com/users/**ABC123**

Parameters.Name: Token
Parameters.Label: Token
Parameters.HelpText:
The API token of the PagerDuty instance.

Found here: https://mydomain.pagerduty.com/api_keys

Parameters.Name: Description
Parameters.Label: Description
Parameters.HelpText: A description for this maintenance window.

Parameters.Name: ServiceIds
Parameters.Label: ServiceIds
Parameters.HelpText:
A comma separated list of the service ids that are affected by this maintenance window.

Found here: https://mydomain.pagerduty.com/services/**ABC123**

Example: ABC123, ABC456

Parameters.Name: Subdomain
Parameters.Label: Subdomain
Parameters.HelpText:
The subdomain of the PagerDuty instance.

Found here: https://**mydomain**.pagerduty.com/
